main.title: Gar-Type
main.description: Gar-Type is a free pixel art shooter game developed by Lumpy, inspired by the mysterious Gar character. This sci-fi adventure game combines humor with intense action as players defend Earth from the invasion of the living planet Gar. Piloting humanity's secret prototype ship becomes our last hope for survival.
main.seoTitle: Gar-Type - Free Pixel Art Shooter Game
main.seoDescription: Play Gar-Type, a free pixel art shooter game with sci-fi humor. Control a prototype spaceship, defend Earth from invasion, and enjoy challenging boss battles!

about.title: About Gar-Type
about.description: Gar-Type is a free pixel art shooter game developed by Lumpy, drawing inspiration from the mysterious "Gar" character. This sci-fi adventure combines humor with intense action as you defend Earth from the living planet Gar's invasion. Pilot humanity's secret prototype ship and become our last hope for survival.

play.title: How To Play
play.steps1: Start by selecting your ship configuration
play.steps3: Master the shooting mechanics with mouse control
play.steps4: Complete tutorial missions to understand core mechanics
play.steps5: Keep moving to avoid enemy fire
play.steps6: Use terrain for cover when possible

faq.anw1: The game is free, requires no installation and can be played directly in the browser (some devices may need to download a native version).
faq.qes2: What platforms does the game support?
faq.anw2: It currently supports Windows and browser (Web version),Mobile (phone/tablet) and console (PS/Xbox/Switch) are not supported.
faq.qes3: Does the game have a multiplayer mode?
faq.anw3: Currently only single-player mode is supported, with no local or online multiplayer.
faq.anw4: The game is challenging, especially in BOSS battles and barrage scenarios, and requires flexibility,However, the game supports random powerups, and proper use can reduce the difficulty.
faq.anw5: Yes, you can choose between Easy, Normal, and Hard difficulty modes at the start of your game.
faq.qes6: Why is the game painting so strange?
faq.anw6: The game uses pixel art style to pay homage to classic arcade shooters, while incorporating humorous and quirky elements,For example: The enemy design is inspired by Garfield and has many fun spoof details.
faq.qes7: What about the sound and music?
faq.anw7: The background music of the game has a retro arcade style to enhance the immersion,Some of the sound effects and BOSS dubbing have funny elements to make the battle more interesting.
faq.qes8: Does the game have hidden elements or Easter eggs?
faq.anw8: Yes, we do! The game has hidden enemies, funny dialogue and special events that can be played multiple times to try to discover,Some levels may feature tribute elements that parody classic shooters.

reviews.com1: This game is hilarious! The combination of Garfield and shooter is really creative ðŸ˜‚
reviews.com2: The pixel style is great, it feels like playing an old arcade game, and the BGM is also very exciting!
reviews.com3: The game is a bit difficult, the BOSS battles are super exciting, but sometimes I feel that the teleportation skills are difficult to control.
reviews.com4: Lumpy Touch's work is always so interesting! Hoping for more levels.
reviews.com5: It has the feeling of ã€ŠR-Typeã€‹ and ã€ŠThunderã€‹ to play, nostalgic and novel, recommended to players who like STG!
reviews.com6: Good game, but a little difficult, can you add an easy mode? ðŸ˜‚
reviews.com7: The music reminds me of the old arcade games I used to play when I was a kid. It's amazing!
reviews.com8: The BOSS battle is really challenging, especially the last level, almost did not stick!
reviews.com9: This game is perfect for Garfield fans! The enemy design is full of detail and really funny.
reviews.com10: The pace of the game is very fast, it is a little difficult to get started at first, but after getting used to it, you can't stop!
reviews.com11: Try to challenge speed pass, feel quite likely to break the record, looking forward to the official ranking!
reviews.com12: The game is very interesting, but some parts of the difficulty is a little unreasonable, I hope to optimize it.

seo.title: Gar-Type - Free Pixel Art Shooter Game
seo.description: Play Gar-Type, a free pixel art shooter game with intense action and humor. Defend Earth from the living planet Gar's invasion in this sci-fi adventure.
seo.keywords: pixel art game, shooter game, sci-fi game, free online game, arcade game, space shooter, retro game

privacy.seoDescription: Learn about how Gar-Type collects and protects your personal information. Read our privacy policy for detailed information about data usage and protection.
privacy.welcome_message: Welcome to Gar-Type (hereinafter referred to as the Game). The game respects users' privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. Please read this Privacy Policy carefully to understand how we collect, use and protect your information.
privacy.data_collection1: When you use the game, we may collect the following information:
privacy.device_info_item: Include the device model, operating system, and unique device identifier.
privacy.game_data_item: Include game progress, score, leaderboard data, etc.
privacy.user_feedback_item: If you provide feedback via email or forum, we may collect your contact information.
privacy.data_usage1: Information we collect may be used for the following purposes:
privacy.improve_experience_item: Optimize performance, fix bugs, adjust game difficulty.
privacy.analytics_item: Analyze user behavior to improve game content.
privacy.customer_support_item: Respond to your feedback and questions.
privacy.data_sharing1: We do not sell or rent your personal information. Exceptions are:
privacy.legal_compliance_item: We may disclose your information when required by law or requested by law enforcement agencies.
privacy.business_change_item: In the event of a transfer, merger or sale of the game, your information may be transferred.
privacy.third_party_services_item: The game may integrate third party services (e.g. advertising, analytics tools). These services may collect some information about you and their privacy policies apply to their data collection practices.
privacy.data_security_item: We take reasonable security measures to protect your information, but please note that no Internet transmission is guaranteed to be 100% secure.
privacy.updates_item: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and the latest version will be posted on this page.
privacy.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us

terms.seoDescription: Read Gar-Type's terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for playing our game. Learn about user conduct and intellectual property rights.
terms.welcome_message: Welcome to Gar-Type (hereinafter referred to as the Game). Please read this User Agreement carefully before using this game.
terms.user_terms1: You must comply with applicable laws and regulations.
terms.user_terms2: You may not use the Game for any illegal or improper conduct.
terms.user_terms3: All content in the game, including but not limited to images, sounds, and code, is protected by copyright
terms.account_data1: The game may store your game progress and leaderboard data.
terms.account_data2: We are not responsible for losses caused by data loss or game errors.
terms.disclaimer1: The game is provided as is without any warranty of availability, bug free or suitability.
terms.disclaimer2: We are not responsible for service interruption due to force majeure factors (such as server failure, network problems, etc.)
terms.stop_agree1: If you breach this Agreement, we have the right to terminate your rights to use.
terms.update: We may modify this Agreement at any time, and the latest version will be posted on this page.
terms.contact: If you have any questions, please contact us
